title: Charlotte-Mecklenburg police ‘frustrated’ by uptick in violent crimes
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer: Crime - Today 
Homicides, rapes, robberies and other crimes are up from 2014‘It’s just disturbing,’ Deputy Chief Katrina Graue says … Click to Cont...
